Flavours the Whole Fam Will Love

From brunch to dinner and arcade fun, Urban Diner at Pacific Epping offers family-friendly dining and entertainment all in one place. Discover easy meals, sweet treats and good times for all ages.

Family Feasts Around Every Corner

Urban Diner at Pacific Epping is packed with flavours the whole crew will love. Whether it’s a lazy weekend brunch, a cheeky dessert stop, or dinner before a movie, there’s always something on the menu to make your day tastier.

 

Brunch goals for all ages

Start the morning right at The Groove Train with fluffy pancakes, loaded toasties and good coffee. After something warm and hearty? Little Indo Town dishes up comforting rice and noodle favourites that hit the spot.


 

Dinner with no fuss (and no whingeing)

Everyone’s craving something different? No problem. Volcanos Steakhouse serves up halal steaks and loaded mocktails, while Schnitz keeps it classic with crumbed goodness and chips for all. Craving a little crunch? Gami Chicken and Beer is famous for their Korean fried chicken – and their cheesy platters are always a win.


 

Sweet treats + screen time

Every family night deserves dessert. Share a plate of churros at San Churro or go all out with sundaes and shakes. Then head to Reading Cinemas for the latest flick (and yes, popcorn is a must).


 

Play time unlocked

Need to burn off the sugar? Timezone Epping is right here with 75+ arcade games, laser tag, bowling and more. It’s a guaranteed good time for kids and grown-ups alike.

 

One stop. Endless family faves.

Urban Diner isn’t just about food, it’s about easy, tasty outings that keep the whole family happy. Come hungry, leave smiling!

We recognise First Nations peoples’ longstanding and ongoing spiritual connections to land, sea, community, and country.
